title: Topic 002 Question 008
body: You have an Azure subscription named AZPT1 that contains the resources shown in the following table:
You create a new Azure subscription named AZPT2.
You need to identify which resources can be moved to AZPT2.
options: VM1, storage1, VNET1, and VM1Managed only
VM1, storage1, VNET1, VM1Managed, and RVAULT1
